author: mmusich
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## Upgrade
- **PhaseI design scenario** : [80X_upgrade2017_design_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_upgrade2017_design_v7) as [80X_upgrade2017_design_v6](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_upgrade2017_design_v6) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_upgrade2017_design_v7/80X_upgrade2017_design_v6): 
  - added L1 uGT stage-II menu
  - updated pre-shower pedestals to latest values.
title: Adding the Stage-II L1 menu to phase-I upgrade simulation
